description: Try our easy to follow Arancini recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Arancini & croquette,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High protein,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Rice,Peanut free
name: Arancini Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tsp lemon rind, finely grated (plus 2 tbs lemon juice)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Cook chopped onion and crushed garlic cloves in oil until soft. Stir in arborio rice and vegetable stock and bring to boil. Cover. Cook in oven for 20 minutes.
Stir in grated parmesan, lemon rind, lemon juice and chopped basil. Cool. Add 1 egg. Stir in the contents whilst the rice mixture is still hot or once it has cooled slightly. Cover. Chill for 2 hours

Form mixture into 12 balls. Push a mozzarella cube into each. Place flour on a plate, whisk remaining egg in a shallow bowl, and place breadcrumbs on a separate plate. Working with one rice ball at a time, coat in flour, then dip in egg and finish by dipping in breadcrumbs. Set aside. Repeat with remaining rice balls, flour, egg and breadcrumbs. Place on a lined baking tray. Spray with oil. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden and heated through. Serve.
